title: Textiles
creator_credit: Gaumont-British Instructional and John C. Elder
brief_description: A comprehensive survey of the Scottish textile industry, showing the relation between the centres of the various industries and the resources of raw materials and driving-power for the mills. The process of manufacture of tweeds, linen, sailcloth from jute, and cotton and silk thread are shown in detail.
